newsitem.title: USA: Accelr8 gets contract with Colorado city.
newsitem.headline: Accelr8 gets contract with Colorado city.

text.p: Accelr8 Technology Corp has been awarded a contract by the City of Fort Collins, Colorado to identify and fix its software programs that have a Year 2000 or Millenium problem, the firms said on Monday.

Many older computers and software programs, unable to process two-digit dates correctly after December 31, 1999, could crash on January 1, 2000, while many other will think the date is Jauary 1, 1900.
The services will be delivered in several phases with a total contract value expected to be in excess of $500,000 over several quarters, the company said.
